    • getFirstAvailablePort

      public static java.util.Optional<java.net.ServerSocket> getFirstAvailablePort​(int minPort, int maxPort)
      Parameters:
      minPort - is first port (inclusive)
      maxPort - if last port (inclusive)
      Returns:
      Returns the first available port in the range [minPort, maxPort]
